official_title: A bill to deauthorize the Dickey Dam component of the Dickey-Lincoln School Lakes project, Saint John River, Maine.

summary.text: Deauthorizes that component of the Dickey-Lincoln School Lakes project, Saint John River, Maine, known and referred to as the Dickey Dam and its associated transmission facilities.

titles.title: A bill to deauthorize the Dickey Dam component of the Dickey-Lincoln School Lakes project, Saint John River, Maine.
